text: Brook House may refer to: ;in England * Brook House, former home of Lord Louis Mountbatten on Park Lane, London * Brook House F.C., a non-league football club in Hayes, now known as A.F.C. Hayes * Brook House Immigration Removal Centre at Gatwick Airport * A listed building in Blockley, Gloucestershire ;in the United States *Brook Ramble, Townsend, Delaware, listed on the NRHP in New Castle County, Delaware *Brook Hall, Abingdon, Virginia, listed on the NRHP in Washington County, Virginia ==See also== *Brookhouse (disambiguation) *Brook Farm (disambiguation) *Brooks House (disambiguation)
title: Brook House
